dataList.dlg: I am Yi Sang. My name is all I have to say.
Are you sound this morning? Have you returned to the waking world without leaving any memories behind in the night?
The sun stares into my face. I can feel its glare even when my eyes are closed.
I have been merely standing here as the day has faded.
Have you discovered a way to return to the past, or a way to repel the future?
One moment, I stopped my sprint, and confined myself to this bus.
Your clock doesn’t seem to ever stop. It never ceases to bring me back to home each time I perish.
Have you finally located your destination?
Lead the way.
Our destination has many a bump.
Have you found what you seek?
I shall remove the bumps.
Such is the fate of a frequent target.
Hnf…
The mirror of this bump has shattered.
Your clock shall have to wind.
I was met with mirth.
Man will despair.
I’m certain this shan’t last forever. I am therefore apathetic.
The fruits of arduous labor. I feel as though I’m withering.
Thus, in a haze, it pales…
